nodes.text: Eidolon Armaments was a munitions company located in the Corellian Sector of Nar Shaddaa that was part of the Eidolon Security, owned by a former assassin Eidolon. During the Great Hunt (c. 3643 BBY) a Hunter assaulted the Eidolon Armaments and destroyed munitions ready to be shipped to the Republic in order to draw Eidolon, who was a target of the Great Hunt, out of hiding.
Eidolon Armaments appear as an area on Nar Shaddaa in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
